title: What’s life like for an IG BADDIE ft. Iluvsarahii
description:
This week on Fool Coverage, Manny and Laura invite IG baddie and friend, Karen a.k.a iluvsarahii! They talk all about the LA robberies that are going on, the drastic changes that occurred from her diet, how she avoids social media drama, and a nightmare brand trip that got physical...
Follow Karen on IG: @iluvsarahii
Follow Laura on IG: @larlarlee
Follow Manny on IG: @mannymua733

More about the show: 
Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or using this link: https://bit.ly/FoolCoverage
Check out Fool Coverage on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKlJLwZV472zWlO9eQv4RGg.

Thanks to our sponsors: 
Use FCP30 to get 30% off your first month at Scentbird https://sbird.co/3x15C2g


This month we received...
Amber Gaze by Maison Sybarite
Avant L'Orage by Maison Matine
Dirty Vanilla by Heretic Parfums
Sandalwood in Oak by Scents of Wood

For a limited time, we’ve partnered with Current to give away $1,000! That’s right, Current is giving away $250 to four listeners of this show. All you have to do is download the Current app and enter our code FOOL during sign up before December 15th for a chance to win!

Go check out adamandeve.com today, select one item and get 50% off including FREE shipping when you enter offer code FOOL.  

Right now, Modern Fertility is offering our listeners $20 off the test when you go to modernfertility.com/FOOL.

Subscribe to Netflix is a Daily Joke on Apple, Spotify, and all the podcast places.

You can grow thicker, healthier hair AND support our show by going to nutrafol.com/FOOL to save $15 OFF your first month’s subscription.

Check out Manscaped! Get 20% Off and Free Shipping at Manscaped.com with code FOOL. 


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
